Investments PFF Panel 4 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019What are the range of investments we should look out for and are advisable?
2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Depends on you leh. There's many ways to invest, you have to find which one is most suitable for you based on your risk appetite, lifestyle and personality,0 comments0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Mar 2019It depends on your risk appetite. You can consider CPF, ETFs, Stocks, SSBs, High Interest Savings Accouts, REITS and there is even Options although it has a harder learning curve than the others.0 comments0
